mono.usage: Code snippets, ATS Scores, Technical Data

usage_rules.backgrounds: Use Stone-50 for main backgrounds, White for cards.
usage_rules.ctas: Primary buttons are Emerald-900 with White text. Secondary buttons are White with Stone-200 border.
usage_rules.gradients: NO GRADIENTS. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
usage_rules.text: Never use pure black. Use Stone-900 for headings, Stone-600 for body.

spacing_system.base: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 where p-4 is standard.
spacing_system.containers: Max width 1400px for dashboard, 1200px for reading content.
spacing_system.grid_strategy: Use 'Bento' grids. Avoid equal-width columns. Mix 2/3 + 1/3 splits.

grids.dashboard: Mode B: Control Room Grid (Dense, Data-focused)

shadcn_customization.buttons: h-10 px-6 font-medium tracking-wide transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5 active:translate-y-0
shadcn_customization.cards: bg-white border border-stone-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300

custom_components.ATS_Score_Ring: Use a semi-circle gauge with Emerald (Good), Yellow (Avg), Red (Bad).
custom_components.Job_Card: Minimalist. Logo left, Title bold, Tags as pill badges (outline only).
custom_components.Resume_Preview: A4 aspect ratio container with shadow-lg and scale-on-hover.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a fixed position div with 'bg-noise' opacity-5 pointer-events-none z-50 over the whole app.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 for sticky headers and floating panels.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] for cards. shadow-[0_12px_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.08)] for dropdowns.

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4, ease: 'easeOut' }}

hero.usage: Hero section background or split layout image

anti_patterns: NO centered text blocks wider than 600px.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Stone-600 or darker on Stone-50 backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-emerald-500 ring-offset-2 on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts: Outfit and DM Sans via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. Configure Tailwind: Add the colors (Emerald-900, Lime-300, Stone-50) to tailwind.config.js.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that applies the global texture and font settings.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' using the 'Control Room' grid strategy.
5. Build the 'Landing Page' using the 'Tetris' grid strategy.
6. Use 'framer-motion' for all page transitions and hover effects.
7. Ensure all buttons have the 'pill' or 'sharp' style defined in components section.
